sources.title: Sweet Home ( The Mamiya House) [1988]
sources.description: Sweet Home (Japanese: スウィートホーム - Hepburn: Suwīto hōmu) also known as "The Mamiya House" is a 1988 Japanese horror film directed by Kiyoshi Kurosawa and produced by Juzo Itami. It was released alongside a video game of the same title that inspired the Resident Evil game series released by Capcom.
